Replace.Text: A district unique to Vietnam which replaces the Encampment. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent district. After Flight is researched receive [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output. This district does not require population, is cheaper to build, cannot be built adjacent to the city center, does not provide [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points, and is not a specialty district. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] towards Military Engineers.
Vietnamese unique Medieval era ranged unit that replaces the Crossbowman. Ignores ZOC. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +1 sight. Higher defensive strength than a Crossbowman.
